projectDescription: GroupWeave is the open-source infrastructure for user-owned AI, designed to enable co-creation and co-immersion in generative AI content. Currently developing on NEAR, with plans to integrate Shade agents as customizable, semi-autonomous assistants for multimodal content understanding, moderation, and curation.
agentsIntroduction: This document provides comprehensive instructions for developers and AI agents working on this monorepo. It is the single source of truth for repository setup, development workflows, and coding standards. Please read it carefully before contributing.

tooling.name: pnpm
tooling.description: Used for high-performance package management. All npm/yarn commands should be replaced with pnpm.

tooling.name: Turborepo
tooling.description: Used to manage tasks and build pipelines across the monorepo, enabling faster builds and development.

globalCommands.description: Install all dependencies for all workspaces.
Runs all applications in development mode. Use with --filter to run a specific app.
Runs TypeScript type checking across all relevant packages.

workspaces.name: apps/creation
workspaces.description: A Next.js application for creating new GroupWeave content.

workspaces.name: apps/dashboard
workspaces.description: A Next.js application for users to view and manage their content and participation.

workspaces.name: apps/docs
workspaces.description: A Next.js application for viewing project documentation.

workspaces.name: apps/participation
workspaces.description: A Next.js application for participating in GroupWeave experiences and rounds.

workspaces.name: apps/mobile
workspaces.description: A React Native application for GroupWeave on mobile, built with Expo.

workspaces.name: apps/api
workspaces.description: A FastAPI backend providing the main API for GroupWeave services.

workspaces.name: apps/agents
workspaces.description: Contains multiple Rust-based AI agent binaries for various automated tasks.

workspaces.name: apps/contracts
workspaces.description: A workspace containing NEAR smart contracts for on-chain logic, including staking and voting.

workspaces.name: packages/ui
workspaces.description: A shared React component library used across the frontend applications.

workspaces.name: packages/common-types
workspaces.description: Shared TypeScript types and interfaces for consistency across the monorepo.

workspaces.name: packages/near
workspaces.description: Shared utilities and configuration for interacting with the NEAR blockchain.

workspaces.name: packages/eslint-config
workspaces.description: Shared ESLint configurations for maintaining code quality.

workspaces.name: packages/tailwind-config
workspaces.description: Shared Tailwind CSS configuration for consistent styling.

workspaces.name: packages/typescript-config
workspaces.description: Shared TypeScript configurations (tsconfig) for the monorepo.

codingStyle.javascript/typescript: Formatted with Prettier, linted with ESLint. Follows a specific import order. See `packages/eslint-config`.
codingStyle.python: Formatted with black and isort, linted with flake8 and mypy. Configuration is in the `apps/api` directory.
codingStyle.rust: Formatted with rustfmt, linted with cargo clippy. Configuration is in the respective Cargo.toml files.
